original_text: The Lord will strike you with the boils of Egypt, and with tumors and scabs and itch, of which you cannot be healed.
korean_text: 여호와께서 애굽의 종기와 치질과 괴혈병과 피부병으로 너를 치시리니 네가 치유 받지 못할 것이며

sentences.original_text: The Lord will strike you with the boils of Egypt
and with tumors and scabs and itch
of which you cannot be healed
